title: Age of Empires IV – v5.0.7274.0 (Steam) + 2 DLCs
body:
Age of Empires IV – v5.0.7274.0 (Steam) + 2 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Strategy, RTS, Medieval, Isometric, 3D
Companies: Relic Entertainment, World’s Edge, Xbox Game Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI14
Windows 10/11 is REQUIRED for this game
Original Size: 104.7 GB
Repack Size: from 14.6 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: BayFiles
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Age.of.Empires.IV-CODEX ISO release: codex-age.of.empires.iv.iso (58,149,142,528 bytes)
  • Missing localizations (50.5 GB) added
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation; 4K HDR Videos moved to a separate repack
  • 4K HDR Videos moved to a separate repack, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of bonus content (Unit Counters Chart + Banner), “Hands on History” documentaries (unlocked during the campaign) and video packs for languages you don’t need. Keep in mind that for proper gaming experience at least one of the videos pack for your language must be downloaded and installed
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 104.7 to 14.6~52.5 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 7-20 minutes for any single language
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 85.7 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language (if installed with multiple languages)
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 3 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

One of the most beloved real-time strategy games returns to glory with Age of Empires IV, putting you at the center of epic historical battles that shaped the world. Featuring both familiar and innovative new ways to expand your empire in vast landscapes with stunning 4K visual fidelity, Age of Empires IV brings an evolved real-time strategy game to a new generation.

Return to History – The past is prologue as you are immersed in a rich historical setting of 8 diverse civilizations across the world from the English to the Chinese to the Delhi Sultanate in your quest for victory. Build cities, manage resources, and lead your troops to battle on land and at sea in 4 distinct campaigns with 35 missions that span across 500 years of history from the Dark Ages up to the Renaissance.

Choose Your Path to Greatness with Historical Figures – Live the adventures of Joan of Arc in her quest to defeat the English, or command mighty Mongol troops as Genghis Khan in his conquest across Asia. The choice is yours – and every decision you make will determine the outcome of history.

Customize Your Game with Mods – Available in Early 2022, play how you want with user generated content tools for custom games.

Challenge the World – Jump online to compete, cooperate or spectate with up to 7 of your friends in PVP and PVE multiplayer modes.

An Age for All Players – Age of Empires IV is an inviting experience for new players with a tutorial system that teaches the essence of real-time strategy and a Campaign Story Mode designed for first time players to help achieve easy setup and success, yet is challenging enough for veteran players with new game mechanics, evolved strategies, and combat techniques.

Digital Deluxe Edition
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes everything from Age of Empires IV, plus digital bonus content which includes the official Age of Empires IV soundtrack, Unit Counters Chart, art compilation from digital painter Craig Mullins, and exclusive in-game content including a Coat of Arms, Player Profile portrait, and Monument.

Included DLCs:

  • Digital Deluxe Edition Content (w/o OST)
  • CC Gift

You can skip downloading of files you don’t need.Here is the list of such files:

  • fg-selective-english.bin (REQUIRED for English, Russian, Turkish, Vietnamese languages)
  • fg-selective-all-non-english.bin (REQUIRED for all languages but English, Russian, Turkish & Vietnamese)
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-chinese.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-korean.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
  • fg-optional-documentaries.bin (“Hands on History” documentaries)
  • fg-optional-bonus-content.bin (Unit Counters Chart + Banner)

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective/optional” files, but download fg-selective-all-non-english.bin, fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-07).

Age of Empires IV: 4K HDR Video Pack

The Age of Empires IV: 4K HDR Video Pack contains videos from the base game’s campaign and rewards that are increased to ultra-high fidelity resolution. Before you attempt to install, please make sure that your system requirements meet or exceed the minimum specs listed for this specific content pack.

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

4K HDR Video Pack Repack Features

  • Based on 4K HDR Video Pack Steam release with all localizations: 131.7 GB
  • This repack can be installed over my repack or any other repack w/o 4K HDR Videos
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation

  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of 4K “Hands on History” documentaries (unlocked during the campaign) and 4K video packs for languages you don’t need. Keep in mind that for proper gaming experience at least one of the videos pack for your language must be downloaded and installed
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 131.7 to 14.7~88.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 5-10 minutes for any single language
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: adds up to 131.7 GB to existing installation
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

You can skip downloading of files you don’t need.Here is the list of such files:

  • fg-4k-videos-selective-english.bin (REQUIRED for English, Russian, Turkish, Vietnamese languages)
  • fg-4k-videos-selective-all-non-english.bin (REQUIRED for all languages but English, Russian, Turkish & Vietnamese)
  • fg-4k-videos-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-4k-videos-selective-chinese.bin
  • fg-4k-videos-selective-french.bin
  • fg-4k-videos-selective-german.bin
  • fg-4k-videos-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-4k-videos-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-4k-videos-selective-korean.bin
  • fg-4k-videos-selective-spanish.bin
  • fg-4k-videos-optional-documentaries.bin (“Hands on History” documentaries in 4K)
